apiservice.name: Aesir E-Commerce - Department Webservice
apiservice.author: Aesir
apiservice.description: Maintains the department tree inside the companies

create.description: This operation creates a new Aesir E-Commerce Department

field.name: id
field.description: Department ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: image
field.description: URL of image to import into the server for displaying for the department

field.name: company_id
field.description:
Owner company ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: parent_id
field.description:
Department parent ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: address_line1
field.description:
Actual address, first line.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: zip
field.description:
Address zip code.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: city
field.description:
Address city.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

field.name: country_code
field.description:
Address country.
When this field is set, the address_line1, zip, city and country_code fields need to be provided

resource.description: New department internal ID upon success, zero on error

list.description: This operation lists all Aesir E-Commerce Departments

field.name: imageurl
field.description:
Department image URL.
By default this field is empty, but it will populate the URL when sending list[include_images]=true

field.name: state
field.description: True if published, false if unpublished

resource.description: Other valid IDs for the department

Department image URL.
By default this field is empty, but it will populate the URL when sending list[include_images]=true
Other valid IDs for the owner company
Other valid IDs for the parent department
True if published, false if unpublished
Start displaying from a certain item in the list
Total number of pages of items
Limit the number of listed items
Sort list by field and direction

item.description: This operation displays a single Aesir E-Commerce Department

field.name: id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Other valid IDs for the department

Department image URL.
By default this field is empty, but it will populate the URL when sending list[include_images]=true
Other valid IDs for the owner company
Other valid IDs for the parent department
True if published, false if unpublished

update.description: This operation updates Aesir E-Commerce Department

field.name: id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: erp_id
field.description: Set or update the Department ERP ID. It will be stored as erp.<id> for future reference

field.name: alias
field.description: URL safe name. If omitted it will be auto-generated from the name

field.name: image
field.description: URL of image to import into the server for displaying for the department

resource.description: Department internal ID upon success, zero on error

delete.description: This operation deletes Aesir E-Commerce Department(s).

field.name: id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: True on success. False on fail or error

publish.description: This task enables you to set specific departments as published.

field.name: id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal Department ID upon success, zero on error

unpublish.description: This task enables you to set specific departments as unpublished.

field.name: id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal Department ID upon success, zero on error

imageUpload.description: Adds or update an image for a department.

field.name: id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: image
field.description: Image (base64 encoded) to be added to this attribute value.

resource.description: Internal department ID upon success, zero on error

imageRemove.description: Removes an image from a department.

field.name: id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Internal department ID upon success, zero on error

deliveryAddressAdd.description: Add a certain delivery address to a department

field.name: id
field.description:
Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.name: address_id
field.description:
Address ID.

pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

resource.description: Department internal ID upon success, zero on error

Department ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
erp.<id> denotes an ID from the ERP (sent via web services)

field.description:
Address ID.
No prefix denotes an internal id.
pim.<id> denotes a PIM id.
